description:
For wet days at camp or muddy recesses, these pull-on rain pants are a ticket to Drytown. Pull them on over jeans, tights, hiking pants or base layer then brave the storm knowing they'll stay dry. Taped seams prevent water from working its way in and when the sun comes out, they roll up to pack down small.

  • Made of lightweight yet durable 40-denier nylon with MEC's VarioShell waterproof-breathable membrane
  • Unlined 2.5-layer construction keeps them lightweight and packable
  • PFC-free DWR finish for full-on weather protection
  • Fully taped seams keep wetness from seeping in
  • Elasticized pull-on waist with elastic cuffs
name: MEC Aquanator Pants - Youths
